author: Justin Wise
title: Bill Gates says we need a shutdown: Can't reopen business and 'ignore that pile of bodies in the corner'
description: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates on Tuesday said that the United States missed its opportunity to control the outbreak of the novel coronavirus without a shutdown, arguing that the government did not "act fast enough" to a...
content:
Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates on Tuesday said that the United States missed its opportunity to control the outbreak of the novel coronavirus without a shutdown, arguing that the government did not "act fast enough" to avoid this. 
"We need to shut down so … [+2543 chars]
